text: 1.9 Hib 9.14, 1 Jo 1.7, 2.9-11 Binɨb takaw mɨñɨl apin ak kɨli kɨdek ma gɨpal okok, kɨli tap pal okok mɨdeb ak ma nɨgɨnɨgel tek lek, kɨli wɨdɨn koy tek mɨdebal. Binɨb anɨb okok tek, God tap si tap tɨmel gelɨgɨpal ak tɨg walɨg gɨyokɨl gach kɨlop wik yokak ak pen, kɨli sawl gɨl, God kɨlop gak anɨb ak gos nɨg nep ma mɨdebal.
